from tab_pb_flow_in where flow_in_id = #{flowInId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=0

update tab_pb_flow_in set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, flow_in_date = #{flowInDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flow_in_type = #{flowInType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, flow_in_range = #{flowInRange,jdbcType=BIGINT}, flow_in_reason = #{flowInReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_place = #{oldPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_unit_name = #{oldUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_orgnize_id = #{oldOrgnizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, old_orgnize_code = #{oldOrgnizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_orgnize_name = #{oldOrgnizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_orgnize_phone = #{oldOrgnizePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_orgnize_contactor = #{oldOrgnizeContactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_contact_phone = #{oldContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_unit_postcode = #{oldUnitPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_date = #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, return_tag = #{returnTag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, flow_out_id = #{flowOutId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ebl_flag = #{eblFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, flow_in_state = #{flowInState,jdbcType=BIGINT} where flow_in_id = #{flowInId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tab_pb_flow_in AS t LEFT JOIN sys_user AS s ON t.user_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON t.org_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN tab_pb_flow_out f on t.flow_out_id=f.flow_out_id AND d.del_flag = '0' where 1=1
AND s.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND s.id_card_no = #{idCardNo}
AND (d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId} OR d.parent_id = #{rangeDeptId})
AND find_in_set(#{rangeDeptId}, d.full_path)
AND d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId}
AND t.del_flag = '0' order by t.flow_in_id desc

SELECT
FROM tab_pb_flow_in AS t LEFT JOIN sys_user AS s ON t.user_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON t.org_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN tab_pb_flow_out f on t.flow_out_id=f.flow_out_id where t.flow_in_id = #{flowInId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
